BlogEntry.Title: Beda's Law
BlogEntry.Description:
At the party I've come up with a law.  You heard it here first:

"If I can write 80% of a piece of software in a weekend, there is no business model for that software."

I fundamentally believe that there is no money to be made by selling people blogging tools (like Radio).  They are just too easy to write.  Providing a hosting/blogging/etc. service is another thing entirely.

BlogEntry.Title: Pics of the new car...
BlogEntry.Description: I really have to write some software for doing picture galleries so that I can put up a bunch of stuff from my trip.  In the meantime, here are some links to a thread I started over on the roadfly forum about the new ride.  There are some pictures from the trip up there.

BlogEntry.Title: Party at the Scoble's!
BlogEntry.Description: I just got back from a house warming party at Robert and Maryam Scoble's.  The have a great new house and the party  was a lot of fun.  The food was amazing! I don't think I'll be able to eat for days.
